songs.title: One Standard, One Ethic
songs.lyrics:
In the mist of inferno
I seek Salvation
Filth cannot taint my allegiance for my heart
Holds the truth

My heart and my mind worship discipline
And filter right from wrong. Purification
Sworn to justice to cast iniquities
Into the shadows of oblivion
Untouched by the dirt of lust

One standard, one ethic
Redemption for all innocent life
One standard, one ethic
Reverence for the sentient
